sigma.pro

00001 pro sigma
00002 
00003     cdfId   = ncdf_open ( 'f_rzvv.nc', /noWrite )
00004     glob    = ncdf_inquire ( cdfId )
00005 
00006     ; Read netcdf data into variables
00007 
00008     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'f_rzvv', f_rzvv
00009     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'R_binCenters', R_binCenters
00010     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'z_binCenters', z_binCenters
00011     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binCenters', vPerp_binCenters
00012     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binCenters', vPar_binCenters
00013     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'R_binEdges', R_binEdges
00014     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'z_binEdges', z_binEdges
00015     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binEdges', vPerp_binEdges
00016     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binEdges', vPar_binEdges
00017     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'nP', nP
00018 ;   ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'R_binSize', R_binSize
00019 ;   ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'z_binSize', z_binSize
00020 ;   ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binSize', vPerp_binSize
00021 ;   ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binSize', vPar_binSize
00022 
00023     ncdf_close, cdfId
00024 
00025     R_nBins = n_elements ( R_binCenters )
00026     z_nBins = n_elements ( z_binCenters )   
00027     vPerp_nBins = n_elements ( vPerp_binCenters )
00028     vPar_nBins  = n_elements ( vPar_binCenters )    
00029 
00030     vPerp_binSize   = vPerp_binCenters[1]-vPerp_binCenters[0]
00031     vPar_binSize    = vPar_binCenters[1]-vPar_binCenters[0]
00032     R_binSize   = R_binCenters[1]-R_binCenters[0]
00033     z_binSize   = abs ( z_binCenters[1]-z_binCenters[0] )
00034 
00035     w   = 30.0e6 * 2.0 * !pi
00036     kPar_   = 100.0 
00037     kPerp_  = 100.0 
00038     c   = 3.0e8
00039     m   = 2.0 * 1.67262e-27
00040     e   = 1.602176e-19
00041     eNorm   = 100.0e3
00042     n   = 1.0e19
00043     
00044     ;   Normalisation variables, inherited from Harvey and CQL3D
00045     ;   Stuff that, follow stix eqn. 10.38 to start.
00046 
00047     mu  = m * c^2 / ( 2.0 * e * eNorm )
00048     vc  = c / sqrt ( mu )
00049 
00050     ;   Pick some test location
00051 
00052     rPt = 12
00053     zPt = 25
00054 
00055     f_vv    = reform ( f_rzvv[rPt,zPt,*,*] )
00056 
00057 
00058     nf_f    = n / vc^3 / ( total ( f_vv ) * $
00059         vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize )
00060 
00061     ;f_vv   = f_vv * nf_f
00062 
00063     vPerp_2D    = rebin ( vPerp_binCenters, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00064     vPar_2D     = transpose ( rebin ( vPar_binCenters, vPar_nBins, vPerp_nBins ) )
00065 
00066     nf_v    = vc / max ( sqrt ( vPerp_2D^2 + vPar_2D^2 ) )
00067 
00068     uPerp_binCenters    = vPerp_binCenters
00069     uPar_binCenters = vPar_binCenters
00070     uPerp_binSize   = vPerp_binSize 
00071     uPar_binSize    = vPar_binSize 
00072     uPerp_2D    = vPerp_2D 
00073     uPar_2D = vPar_2D 
00074 
00075         ;   Test maxwellian
00076 
00077     vSigma  = 7e5 
00078     vA  = max ( f_vv )  
00079     f_vv_   = vA * exp (-( uPerp_2D^2/(2.0*vSigma^2) + uPar_2D^2/(2.0*vSigma^2) ) )
00080 
00081     ;f_vv   = f_vv_
00082 
00083     ;   Calculate derivatives
00084 
00085     dfduPerp    = dlg_pDeriv ( f_vv, 1, uPerp_binSize )
00086     dfduPar     = dlg_pDeriv ( f_vv, 2, uPar_binSize )
00087 
00088     dfduPerp_   = dlg_pDeriv ( f_vv_, 1, uPerp_binSize )
00089     dfduPar_    = dlg_pDeriv ( f_vv_, 2, uPar_binSize )
00090 
00091     ;   Calculate susceptability as a function of kPerp and kPar
00092     ;   for some frequency @ rPt, zPt
00093 
00094     q   = e
00095     B   = 1.5
00096     omega   = q * B / ( m )
00097 
00098     kPerp   = (fIndGen ( 100 )+1.0) * 10.0
00099     kPar    = (fIndGen ( 20 )+1.0) * 50.0
00100 
00101     kPerp_nBins = n_elements ( kPerp )
00102     kPar_nBins  = n_elements ( kPar )
00103 
00104     chi = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, kPar_nBins )
00105     chi_    = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, kPar_nBins )
00106 
00107     lMax    = 10
00108 
00109     Jm1 = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, lMax*2+1, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00110     J_  = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, lMax*2+1, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00111     Jp1 = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, lMax*2+1, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00112     dJ  = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, lMax*2+1, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00113     T11 = fltArr ( kPerp_nBins, lMax*2+1, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00114 
00115     ;   Calculate besel functions outside of the kPar loop
00116 
00117     print, 'Calculating besel functions ... '
00118     for i=0,kPerp_nBins-1 do begin
00119 
00120         x   = kPerp[i] * uPerp_2D / omega
00121 
00122         for l=-lMax,lMax do begin
00123             
00124             Jm1[i,l+lMax,*,*]   = beselJ ( x, abs ( l-1 ) )
00125             J_[i,l+lMax,*,*]    = beselJ ( x, abs ( l ) ) 
00126             Jp1[i,l+lMax,*,*]   = beselJ ( x, abs ( l+1 ) )
00127         
00128             if l lt 0 then begin
00129                 Jm1[i,l+lMax,*,*]   = (-1)^abs ( l-1 ) * Jm1[i,l+lMax,*,*]
00130                 J_[i,l+lMax,*,*]    = (-1)^abs ( l ) * J_[i,l+lMax,*,*]
00131                 Jp1[i,l+lMax,*,*]   = (-1)^abs ( l+1 ) * Jp1[i,l+lMax,*,*]
00132             endif
00133 
00134             if abs(l) ge 1 then begin
00135                 dJ[i,l+lMax,*,*]    = Jm1[i,l+lMax,*,*] - J_[i,l+lMax,*,*] * l / x
00136             endif else begin
00137                 dJ[i,l+lMax,*,*]    = l / x * J_[i,l+lMax,*,*] - Jp1[i,l+lMax,*,*]
00138             endelse
00139     
00140             T11[i,l+lMax,*,*]   = uPerp_2D^2 * l^2 * J_[i,l+lMax,*,*]^2 / x^2
00141 
00142         endfor
00143     endfor
00144 
00145     ;   Calculate U outside of the kPerp loop
00146 
00147     U   = fltArr ( kPar_nBins, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00148     U_  = fltArr ( kPar_nBins, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins )
00149 
00150     for j=0,kPar_nBins-1 do begin
00151     
00152         U[j,*,*]    = dfduPerp + kPar[j] / w * ( uPerp_2D * dfduPar - uPar_2D * dfduPerp )
00153         U_[j,*,*]   = dfduPerp_ + kPar[j] / w * ( uPerp_2D * dfduPar_ - uPar_2D * dfduPerp_ )
00154 
00155     endfor
00156 
00157     for i=0,kPerp_nBins-1 do begin
00158     
00159         for j=0,kPar_nBins-1 do begin
00160             
00161             for l=-lmax,lMax do begin
00162 
00163                 int_dVPerp  = fltArr ( vPar_nBins )
00164                 for n=0,vPar_nBins-1 do begin   
00165                     int_dVPerp[n]   = int_tabulated ( uPerp_binCenters, U[j,*,n] * T11[i,l+lMax,*,n] )
00166                 endfor
00167 
00168                 int_dVPar   = int_tabulated ( uPar_binCenters, $
00169                     int_dVPerp / ( w - kPar[j] * uPar_binCenters - l * omega ) ) 
00170             
00171                 chi[i,j]    = chi[i,j] + int_dVPar
00172 
00173                 int_dVPerp  = fltArr ( vPar_nBins )
00174                 for n=0,vPar_nBins-1 do begin   
00175                     int_dVPerp[n]   = int_tabulated ( uPerp_binCenters, U_[j,*,n] * T11[i,l+lMax,*,n] )
00176                 endfor
00177 
00178                 int_dVPar   = int_tabulated ( uPar_binCenters, $
00179                     int_dVPerp / ( w - kPar[j] * uPar_binCenters - l * omega ) ) 
00180             
00181                 chi_[i,j]   = chi_[i,j] + int_dVPar
00182 
00183             endfor
00184             print, l, kPerp[i], kPar[j], chi[i,j], min ( abs ( w - kPar[j] * uPar_binCenters - l * omega ) )
00185         endfor
00186     endfor
00187 
00188     ;   Plot some info
00189 
00190     !p.multi = [0,3,4]
00191     window, xSize = 1000, ySize = 1200
00192     @daves_paths
00193     set_plot, 'X'
00194     device, decomposed = 0
00195     !p.background = 0
00196     !p.charSize = 2.0
00197     loadct, 13, file = colortb_path
00198     levels  = 2.0 ^ fIndGen ( 10 ) * 1e2
00199     dLevels = 2.0 ^ fIndGen ( 10 ) * 1e-4
00200     dLevels = [ -reverse ( dLevels ), dLevels ]
00201     colors  = bytScl ( fIndGen ( 10 ), top = 254/2.0 ) + 254/2.0
00202     dColors = bytScl ( fIndGen ( 20 ), top = 253 ) + 1
00203 
00204     contour, transpose ( f_vv ), uPar_binCenters, uPerp_binCenters, $
00205         levels = levels, c_colors = colors, color = 255, charSize = 2.0
00206     contour, transpose ( dfduPerp ), uPar_binCenters, uPerp_binCenters, $
00207         color = 255, levels = dLevels, c_colors = dColors, charSize = 2.0
00208     contour, transpose ( dfduPar ), uPar_binCenters, uPerp_binCenters, $
00209         color = 255, levels = dLevels, c_colors = dColors, charSize = 2.0
00210     contour, transpose ( uPerp_2D * dfduPar ), uPar_binCenters, uPerp_binCenters, $
00211         color = 255, levels = dLevels*1e5, c_colors = dColors, charSize = 2.0
00212     contour, transpose ( uPar_2D * dfduPerp ), uPar_binCenters, uPerp_binCenters, $
00213         color = 255, levels = dLevels*1e5, c_colors = dColors, charSize = 2.0
00214     contour, transpose ( uPar_2D * dfduPerp - uPerp_2D * dfduPar ), uPar_binCenters, uPerp_binCenters, $
00215         color = 255, levels = dLevels*1e5, c_colors = dColors, charSize = 2.0
00216 
00217     plot, uPar_binCenters, uPar_binCenters * total ( dfduPerp, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 255
00218     oplot, uPar_binCenters, uPar_binCenters * total ( dfduPerp_, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 250, thick = 2.0
00219 
00220     plot, uPar_binCenters, dlg_pDeriv ( total ( uPerp_2D * f_vv, 1 ), 1, uPar_binSize ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 255
00221     oplot, uPar_binCenters, dlg_pDeriv ( total ( uPerp_2D * f_vv_, 1 ), 1, uPar_binSize ) * uPerp_binSize,$
00222         color = 250, thick = 2.0 
00223     ;oPlot, uPar_binCenters, total ( uPerp_2D * dfduPar_binSize, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 50
00224 
00225     plot, uPar_binCenters, total ( uPar_2D * dfduPerp - uPerp_2D * dfduPar, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 255
00226     ;oPlot, uPar_binCenters, uPar_binCenters * total ( dfduPerp_binSize, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize $
00227     ;   - dlg_pDeriv ( total ( uPerp_2D * f_vv, 1 ), 1, uPar_binSize ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 50
00228     oplot, uPar_binCenters, total ( uPar_2D * dfduPerp_ - uPerp_2D * dfduPar_, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize,$
00229         color = 250, thick = 2.0
00230 
00231     xyOuts, 2.0e6*nf_v,1.5e-7*nf_v, $
00232         string( total (total ( uPar_2D * dfduPerp - uPerp_2D * dfduPar, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize ),$
00233         for = '(e7.1)' ),$
00234         color = 255, /data, charSize = 1.0
00235     xyOuts, 2.0e6*nf_v,1.0e-7*nf_v, $
00236         string( total (total ( uPar_2D * dfduPerp_ - uPerp_2D * dfduPar_, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize ),$
00237         for = '(e7.1)' ),$
00238         color = 250, /data, charSize = 1.0, charThick = 2.0
00239     
00240     plot, uPar_binCenters, total ( dfduPerp, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize, color = 255
00241     oplot, uPar_binCenters, kPar_ / w * uPar_binCenters * total ( dfduPerp, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize,$
00242         color = 255
00243     oplot, uPar_binCenters,$
00244         kPar_ / w * dlg_pDeriv ( total ( uPerp_2D * f_vv, 1 ), 1, uPar_binSize ) * uPerp_binSize,$
00245         color = 255
00246     oplot, uPar_binCenters, kPar_ / w * $
00247         ( uPar_binCenters * total ( dfduPerp, 1 ) * uPerp_binSize $
00248             - dlg_pDeriv ( total ( uPerp_2D * f_vv, 1 ), 1, uPar_binSize ) * uPerp_binSize ),$
00249         color = 255
00250 
00251     !p.multi = 0
00252 
00253     window, 3
00254     
00255     dLevels = 2.0 ^ fIndGen ( 10 ) * 1e-3
00256     dLevels = [ -reverse ( dLevels ), dLevels ]
00257     dColors = bytScl ( fIndGen ( 20 ), top = 253 ) + 1
00258 
00259 
00260     contour, chi, c_colors=dColors, levels=dLevels, /fill
00261     iiPos   = where(dLevels gt 0 )
00262     dColors[iiPos]  = (dColors[iiPos]+20)<254
00263     iiNeg   = where(dLevels lt 0 )
00264     dColors[iiNeg]  = (dColors[iiNeg]-20)>1
00265     contour, chi_, c_colors=((dColors*1.2)<254)>1, levels=dLevels, /over
00266
